snippet: Calvin Klein’s Francisco Costa brought the New York collections to a close this afternoon with a new take on the geometric black-and-white graphics that have been seen all over the runways in the form of stripes, grids and checks.
abstract: Calvin Klein’s Francisco Costa brought the New York collections to a close this afternoon with a new take on the geometric black-and-white graphics that have been seen all over the runways in the form of stripes, grids and checks.

headline.main: The New York Finale at Calvin Klein
